Html:
What would someone charge to write some code for me?

I need to have a page where a user can upload a xls file that has a really strange layout to it, clean the data, then upload it to a mysql db. I receive several xls files that are generated from an evil computer that I don't have access. It puts logos and charts and other useless data on the xls. I need it to go through and add columns according to certain fields, count then delete duplicates, et cetera.
